title: BBC Local Live: Beds, Herts & Bucks on Wednesday 23 September 2015. - BBC News
summary: an inquest has opened into the death of a family from milton keynes , who died in a plane crash in canada .
herts police called in after a row during big brother 's bit on the side at elstree studios yesterday .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates have finished for today , but we 'll be back again from 08:00 tomorrow .
join us again for all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for beds , herts and bucks .

documents.title: warning after five fatal bedfordshire collisions in nine days
text: police are urging motorists to be cautious on the roads after five fatal collisions in bedfordshire since monday of last week .
`` fatalities in bedfordshire this year are slightly up , whereas in hertfordshire it 's slightly down , '' said insp bob turner from beds , herts and cambs roads policing .
`` they 're for varied reasons - we 've got cyclists , motorcyclists , cars , lorries , pedestrians , it 's not just one form of road user . ''
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: travel : serious delays on m25 in bucks and herts
text: two lanes are closed clockwise on the m25 in buckinghamshire due to a multi-vehicle collision after j16 for the m40 .
bucks and mk fire
bucksfire
# m25 junction 16-17 update : firefighters are working to release a casualty from one of the cars
congestion remains on the anti-clockwise carriageway after a car transporter fire earlier between j25-j24 .
# m25 junction 16-17 update : firefighters are working to release a casualty from one of the cars
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: houghton regis bank to close despite petition
text: a woman from toddington has started a petition to stop the 18 november closure of the natwest branch in houghton regis ; the only bank .
in the village .

linda horn said a bank manager had been `` very keen to get across that these decisions are never taken lightly , '' while a statement from natwest said their research showed only 59 people used the branch on a weekly basis .
author: Roberto Perrone
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: armed robbery at luton post office 'traumatising '
text: staff working at a post office in calverton road , luton , have been left `` traumatised '' after being robbed at gunpoint at about 07:30 .
police say a man threatened staff with what 's believed to be a handgun to obtain cash before leaving in the direction of lamorna close .
he is described as black , of medium build , and wearing dark clothing with a hi-visibility jacket .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a428 bromham crash victim named
text: police have named a woman who died yesterday in a collision on the a428 near bromham as 56-year-old sandra nightingale .
a 19-year-old man was arrested and bailed on sus of causing death by dangerous driving .

documents.title: inquest opened into death of british family in canada seaplane crash
text: an inquest has opened into the death of a family from milton keynes , who died in a plane crash in canada .
fiona and richard hewitt , and their two teenage children , harry and felicity , were killed when their sightseeing plane came down on the side of a mountain .
the inquest has been adjourned until an investigation has been completed .
author: Lee Agnew
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: latest headlines : luton house searched over 2003 'murder ' case inquest into mk family canada plane crash
text: the top stories so far this evening :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: st albans review : residents cry foul over football noise
text: families neighbouring a nine-pitch football development in london colney say they may be forced to move if something is not done about the noise .

documents.title: netball superleague 2016 : hertfordshire mavericks face dragons
text: hertfordshire mavericks face the celtic dragons in the netball superleague , as all eight franchises open the season on 30 january at the national exhibition centre in birmingham .
it will be the first time the opening round of four fixtures has been held at one venue on the same day .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : rain increasing overnight
text: tonight : there will be a few clear spells at first , but cloud will increase from the west with the chance of some light , patchy rain .
lows of 11c ( 52f ) .
tomorrow : cloud and rain clearing eastwards out of the region leaving sunny spells through the morning .
highs around 17c ( 63f ) .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather presenter

documents.title: travel : slow on m25 and trains delayed in herts
text: the m25 clockwise is still slow due to a lane closure after a car transporter caught fire this morning .
there are delays from j25-24 .
there 's a lane blocked on the exit slip road clockwise on the m25 at j25 due to a broken down car .
abellio greater anglia trains are delayed by up to 20 minutes through hertfordshire due to a level crossing problem in broxbourne .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: man exposes himself to dog walker in beaconsfield
text: a man exposed himself to a dog walker in beaconsfield yesterday evening .
a woman in her 40s was walking between gregories road and baring road at 18:50 when a man his mid-20s approached her .
he is described as pale-skinned , stocky with a stubbly beard .
he was wearing light jeans and a black hoodie .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines : police search house over 2003 'murder ' herts police called to big brother brawl
text: the stories we 're looking at for beds , herts and bucks :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: appspond lane site : fire crews attend due to large amounts of smoke
text: fire crews are back at the appspond lane site in hertfordshire after large amounts of smoke from a wood chip pile yesterday .
ian parkhouse , from hertfordshire fire and rescue , said crews were there until 23:00 last night and returned this morning .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police appeal after glass attack in st albans club
text: an image of a man wanted by police in connection with a glass attack in a st albans club has been released .
a man in his 20s suffered lacerations to the back of the head after being hit by a glass in club veeda at about 01:30 on 12 september .

documents.title: mk dons ' nicky maynard available for tonight 's game
text: milton keynes dons have received international clearance for new striker nicky maynard .
maynard , who signed at stadium : mk until the end of the season , is available for selection for tonight 's league cup clash with premier league side southampton .
author: Luke Ashmead
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

documents.title: mk citizen : funerals of family killed in canada plane crash to be held
text: the funerals of a family killed in a plane crash in canada can now be held - one month after their tragic deaths .

documents.title: luton house searched in 'murder ' case : at the scene
text: there 's still a lot of activity outside the house in icknield way , luton , being searched as part of a 12-year-old suspected murder case .
i can count five police cars and a forensics van .
a number of officers have gone in and out of the house wearing white suits and face masks .
earlier senior detectives visited the scene and took away a ford fiesta parked on the drive .
author: Neil Bradford
BBC Look East

documents.title: two arrested following collisions in bedfordshire this week
text: two people have been arrested over two deaths in separate crashes on the roads in bedfordshire this week .
a 66-year-old man from colchester has been released on police bail after a cyclist died on the a421 bedford bypass early yesterday morning .
he was arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving , failing to stop and failing to report an accident .
another man was arrested on sus of dangerous driving after a woman in her 50s was killed in a two-car crash in bromham on the a428 yesterday .
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: onemk : milton keynes care home 'requires improvement '
text: a care home in milton keynes has been told it requires improvement '' in a recent report by the care quality commission .

documents.title: weather : turning cloudier this afternoon
text: this afternoon will start fine with sunny conditions , but there will be a few spots of rain or drizzle in places by this evening .
maximum temperature : 17c ( 63f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: big brother : hertfordshire police called in to row
text: hertfordshire police were called in after a row during big brother 's bit on the side at elstree studios yesterday .
'allo 'allo actress vicki michelle was injured when champagne glasses were allegedly thrown .
she later tweeted she 'd been checked over in hospital and is okay .
she was caught up in the middle of a supposed row between farrah abraham and former contestant aisleyne horgan-wallace .
the programme was taken off the air 10 minutes early .

documents.title: thameslink train services 'unreliable , ' says hertfordshire council
text: hertfordshire county council have called on govia thameslink to improve in an open letter over their `` unreliable train service '' .
the cabinet member for transport , councillor derrick ashley , writes of `` major cancellations '' due to driver shortages `` causing stress '' to residents .
`` travelling by train is by no means a cheap mode of transport , and so for paying customers who expect a decent level of service , repeated cancellations are incredibly frustrating , '' he said .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : luton house searched in 'murder ' investigation a421 crash arrest made
text: the top stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: rugby world cup : milton keynes fanzone under construction
text: the first rugby world cup game in milton keynes happens a week tomorrow , and the locals are certainly gearing up for it .
campbell park will be home to the fanzone , where people can go to watch the games and join in with activities .
this is what it looks like at the moment
the parks trust
theparkstrust
# rwc2015 fanzone build underway in campbell park !
just over a week to go !
# rwc2015 fanzone build underway in campbell park !
just over a week to go !
fantastic to see our supporters @ twitterid part of the # rwc2015 build # localbusiness # lovemk @ twitterid
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: longer police investigation times 'due to cuts '
text: the police federation says an increase in charging times by police - including in hertfordshire - is the result of cuts to police resources .

mark smith , chairman of the essex police federation , said : `` we 've got fewer resources on the street now , so the officers that are on the streets are also the officers investigating the crimes they 've been given . ''
author: Laurence Cawley
BBC News

documents.title: a421 cyclist death : man arrested
text: police have arrested a man from essex following he death of a cyclist on the a421 yesterday .
the collision happened westbound between the a600 and a6 at about 05:30-06:00 .
a 66-year-old man has been arrested and bailed on sus of failing to stop at the scene of a collision and failing to report an accident .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: woman paid 11p an hour by mk family awarded £ 184k
text: a woman recruited from india to be a domestic servant by a milton keynes family , and paid 11p an hour , has been awarded almost £ 184,000 in unpaid wages .
an employment tribunal in cambridge upheld a number of claims after hearing permila tirkey , 39 , worked 18 hour days , for pooja and ajay chandhok for four and a half years .
her legal team say it 's a landmark case as she was specifically recruited from a so-called lower class in india .
the tribunal heard no-one based in the uk would have accepted the conditions .

documents.title: woman who was paid 11p an hour by mk family awarded £ 184k
text: a woman recruited from india to be a domestic servant by a milton keynes family , and paid 11 pence an hour , has been awarded almost £ 184,000 in unpaid wages .
an employment tribunal in cambridge upheld a number of claims after hearing permila tirkey , 39 , worked 18 hour days , for pooja and ajay chandhok for four and a half years .
her legal team say it 's a landmark case as she was specifically recruited from a so-called lower class in india .
the tribunal heard no-one based in the uk would have accepted the conditions .
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: travel : delays still on m25
text: one lane remains closed after an earlier car transporter fire on the m25 anti-clockwise between j25-j24 .
congestion is back to j28 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: luton hotel attempted murder case investigated by professional standards
text: an incident at a luton hotel , which left a man critically injured , is to be investigated by the professional standards department of bedfordshire police .
police were called to the hampton by hilton hotel near luton airport on sunday night and found a man in his 30s with serious head injuries .
a 21-year-old from latvia was arrested at the scene and charged with attempted murder .
it 's emerged officers had earlier spoken with the alleged attacker .

documents.title: appspond lane site : residents concerned over fire risk
text: residents have again raised concerns about a wood recycling facility near st albans , nearly three years on from a major blaze at the appspond lane site .
firefighters were called again yesterday , with smoke drifting across the nearby m1 , and crews are back there this morning .
herts county council is considering taking legal action unless the wood is removed .
author: BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: luton 'murder ' case : police ask acquaintances of couple to speak
text: officers investigating the disappearance and suspected murder of natalia doherty in 2003 are asking anyone who knew her or her husband gerald to get in contact .
`` i would urge anyone who recognises her or her husband gerald from their time at the now-demolished regents arms pub in hastings street to contact us , '' said det sgt graham mcmillan .
police arrested a 71-year-old man from scotland today in connection with the case and are continuing to search a house in luton .

documents.title: natalia doherty 'murder ' : man in 70s arrested on sus of assisting an offender
text: a 71-year-old man from scotland has been arrested on sus of assisting an offender and preventing a lawful burial in connection with thesuspected murder of natalia dohertyin 2003 .
officers are searching a house in icknield way in luton as part of their investigation .
the man has been bailed until october .
police re-appealed for information regarding the case on monday .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingman arrested in connection with 12-year-old 'murder ' case
text: police searching a house in luton in connection with a 12-year-old murder case have arrested a 71-year-old man .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police investigations taking longer to reach charges
text: police are taking longer to investigate cases and bring charges despite a significant fall in recorded crime .
across england and wales , investigations are taking nearly 10 % longer compared with four years ago , despite a 28 % drop in crime .
in hertfordshire , it took an average of 103 days to reach a charge in the first quarter of 2015 - up from 83 days in 2014 .
author: Laurence Cawley
BBC News

documents.title: luton post office robbery
text: here is the scene in calverton road , luton , where armed police were called to this morning after reports of a robbery .
officers have been searching the area since being called at 07:30 .
the post office is open as usual .
author: Neil Bradford
BBC Look East

documents.title: morning headlines : man arrested after woman dies in collision m25 car transporter fire
text: the top stories this morning :
author: Simon Oxley

documents.title: m25 : two lanes open after transporter fire
text: there are severe delays and two lanes are closed on the m25 anti-clockwise between j25 , a10 ( enfield ) and j24 , a111 ( potters bar ) , because of an earlier car transporter fire .
there is a diversion in operation , heading south down the a10 , around the north circular and north back up the a1 .
congestion is back to j27 of the m11 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 'armed police ' seen near luton primary school
text: parents and children may have been shocked to see police near meads primary school in luton this morning .
bedfordshire police says armed officers were responding to reports of a robbery at a post office in calverton road .
the force was called at about 07:30 and is searching the area .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

text: there 's severe disruption between j25 for a10 greater london and j24 for a111 potters bar on the anti-clockwise m25 due to a car transporter fire .
congestion to j27 m11 .

documents.title: high wycombe teenager charged with murder
text: a 17-year-old boy from high wycombe has been charged with murder over the death of a teenager who was stabbed in slough last month .
the boy , who can not be named for legal reasons , is due to appear at reading magistrates ' court today .
two 18-year-olds from high wycombe have already been charged with murder .
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: man arrested after woman dies in bromham crash
text: a man has been arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving .
after a woman died in a two-vehicle crash in bedfordshire yesterday .
the female driver , who was in her 50s , was pronounced dead at the scene following the crash on the a428 in bromham , at about 17:45 .
author: Richard Haugh
BBC News

documents.title: weather : sunny for most of day , some drizzle later
text: after a bright , chilly start we will see plenty of sunshine this morning .
through the afternoon it will become cloudy with rain or drizzle .
top temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
you can see my full forecast on the bbc look east facebook page .

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for beds , herts and bucks
text: between now and 18:00 we 'll be bring you the latest news , weather , sport and travel for beds , herts and bucks .
if you have something to tell then email us , tweet us or head to facebook .
